System.Settings.Get.summary: Retrieves the status and configuration parameters in regards to the (specified) System Settings.

application/json.example: {"Header": {"Code": 1, "Name": "SYSTEM_SETTINGS_CONFIGURATION_DOWNLOAD_COMPLETE"}, "Body": {"ConfigurationId": "System.Settings.Configurations.0"}}

1.description: Raised when a new System Settings Configuration Download is complete.

application/json.example: {"Header": {"Code": 2, "Name": "SYSTEM_SETTINGS_CONFIGURATION_DOWNLOAD_FAILED"}, "Body": {"ConfigurationId": "System.Settings.Configurations.0"}}

2.description: Raised when a new System Settings Configuration Download fails.

3.description: Raised when a new System Settings Configuration Download has timed out.

4.description: Raised when a new System Settings Configuration has been loaded.

5.description: Raised when a new System Settings Configuration has failed to load.
